returns.lockedUntilEpoch: The epoch until which this tip stream is locked

params._accessManager: The address of the access manager contract
params._configurationManager: The address of the configuration manager contract

returns._0: The address of the Fleet Commander Rewards Manager Factory contract

generateRole(uint8,address).details: This function is used to create unique role identifiers for contract-specific roles

params.roleTargetContract: The address of the contract the role is for

returns.allStreams: An array of all TipStream structs

params.recipient: The address of the tip stream recipient

returns._0: TipStream struct with the recipient's tip stream details

returns.total: The total allocation as a Percentage

returns._0: The address of the HarborCommand contract

pause().details: Only callable by addresses with the GUARDIAN_ROLE

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

returns._0: The address of the Raft contract

params.recipient: The address of the tip stream recipient to remove

shake(address).details: Redeems shares, distributes assets to recipients, and sends remaining to treasury

params.fleetCommander: The FleetCommander contract to distribute tips from

shakeAll().details: This function can be called to distribute rewards from all active fleet commandersWarning: This operation can be gas expensive if there are many fleet commanders

shakeMultiple(address[]).details: Calls shake() for each FleetCommander in the array

params.fleetCommanders: An array of FleetCommander contracts to distribute tips from

returns._0: The address of the TipJar contract
The address of the Treasury contract

unpause().details: Only callable by addresses with the GOVERNOR_ROLE

updateTipStream((address,uint256,uint256.details: Warning: A global shake can be gas expensive if there are many fleet commanders

params.shakeAllFleetCommanders: If true, performs a global shake of all fleet commanders before updating

configurationManager().notice: Gets the address of the ConfigurationManager contract

fleetCommanderRewardsManagerFactory().notice: Gets the address of the Fleet Commander Rewards Manager Factory contract

generateRole(uint8,address).notice: Generates a role identifier for a specific contract and role

getTipStream(address).notice: Retrieves a specific tip stream's information

getTotalAllocation().notice: Calculates the total allocation percentage across all tip streams

harborCommand().notice: Gets the address of the HarborCommand contract

pause().notice: Pauses the TipJar, preventing shake operations

raft().notice: Gets the address of the Raft contract

shake(address).notice: Distributes accumulated tips from a single FleetCommander

shakeMultiple(address[]).notice: Distributes accumulated tips from multiple FleetCommanders

tipJar().notice: Gets the address of the TipJar contract

tipStreamRecipients(uint256).notice: List of all tip stream recipient addresses

tipStreams(address).notice: Mapping of recipient addresses to their TipStream structs

treasury().notice: Gets the address of the Treasury contract

unpause().notice: Unpauses the TipJar, allowing shake operations

updateTipStream((address,uint256,uint256.notice: It's good practice to call _shake for all fleet commanders before updating a tip stream to ensure all accumulated rewards are distributed using the current allocation.
